data.actual_result: Message is stuck when send message perm taken while a mesage is left in text box.
data.expected_result: Text box replaced with the "You don't have permission" thing.
data.short_description: Message gets stuck when no send message perm
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a message into the text box - take away the send message perm for the user that has the message unsent in the text box.
